text: 👋 Hey there! 🤔 Have you thought about how different generations approach healthcare? 🤦‍♂️ It's fascinating to see how Gen Z is shaping their habits when it comes to engaging with the healthcare system. 💡 They prioritize virtual options and want personalized use cases, rather than a one-size-fits-all approach. 💻 What do you think about this trend? 🤔 How do you think healthcare providers can adapt to meet the needs of Gen Z? 💬 Share your thoughts! 👇
